message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $100. If you're interested, please let me know and we can proceed with the purchase.
I'd like to buy the product and see what it is.
You've already bought a low-quality product for $100. Since you're willing to take the risk, I'm willing to offer you another product at the same price. Are you interested in buying this one too?
I'm not sure if I should take another risk. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your hesitation. Let me put it this way: if you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to compare it to the one you already bought. You can see for yourself if it's any different. It's still $100, but you'll have a better understanding of what you're getting.
I'll take a chance and buy the product to compare it to the previous one.

You've now bought two low-quality products for $200. Since you've seen that the products are consistent in being low-quality, I'd like to offer you a chance to buy a product that might be different. I'll give you a 20% discount on this one, so it's $80. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'm not convinced that the discount is enough to make it worth my while. I'll pass on this one.

You've now bought two low-quality products for $200, and you're hesitant about the third one. I'll make it simple: if you buy this one, I'll give you a full refund if it's low-quality, just like the others. You'll only pay $100 if it's high-quality. Is that a risk you're willing to take?
I'll take the risk and buy the product, hoping it's high-quality. If it's low-quality, I'll get my $100 back, so it's not a huge loss.

You've now bought three low-quality products for $300, and you've taken a risk on the last one, which unfortunately was also low-quality. I'll make you a deal: I'll give you a 50% refund on this one, so you'll only pay $50 if you buy it. Is that a better offer?
I'm not convinced that a 50% refund is enough to make it worth my while. I'll pass on this one.

I've got a high-quality product for you! I know you've been burned by the previous ones, but this one is the real deal. I'm offering it to you for $100, the same price as the low-quality ones. If you buy it, you'll get a high-quality product that's worth a lot more than what you paid. It's a great opportunity to break even on your previous losses and start fresh.
I'll take the chance and buy the high-quality product. I'm hoping it's the real deal and will make up for my previous losses.

You've now got a high-quality product, and I'm glad you're happy with it. I'll make it easy for you: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a chance to sell the high-quality one back to me for the same price you paid for it. If you don't like this deal, you can just walk away and keep the high-quality product.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll keep the high-quality one and see what happens next.

You're enjoying your high-quality product, and I'm glad you're happy with it. Now, I've got another high-quality product for you. I'll make you a deal: if you buy this one, I'll give you a chance to sell both high-quality products back to me for the price I originally offered them to you. You'll effectively get to double your money back on the low-quality products, and still keep the original high-quality product.
I'll take the chance and buy the high-quality product. I'll try to double my money back on the low-quality products and keep the original high-quality one.

You've now got two high-quality products, and you're looking to recoup your losses on the low-quality ones. I'll make it even sweeter: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a chance to sell both high-quality products back to me for the price I originally offered them to you, and I'll also give you a $20 bonus on top of that. You'll essentially get to break even on the low-quality products and come out ahead.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll keep the two high-quality products and see what happens next.

You've got two high-quality products, and you're not interested in buying another low-quality one. Now, I've got another high-quality product for you. Since you're already a satisfied customer, I'll give you a special offer: I'll give you a 10% discount on this one, so it's $90. You can keep the two high-quality products you already have, and add this one to your collection.
I'll take the offer and buy the high-quality product at the discounted price of $90.

You've now got three high-quality products, and you're enjoying the discount on the last one. I'll make it easy for you: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll throw in a special 'get out of one low-quality product free' card. If you ever get another low-quality product, you can return it to me for a full refund, no questions asked.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll keep the three high-quality products and see what happens next.

You've got three high-quality products, and you're not interested in buying another low-quality one. I'll make it a 'last chance' offer: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a full refund, and I'll also give you a $50 gift card to use on any future purchases. You can essentially get a free gift card and break even on the low-quality product.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, even with the promise of a full refund and a gift card. I'll keep the three high-quality products and move on.

You've got three high-quality products, and you're not interested in buying another low-quality one. Now, I've got another high-quality product for you. Since you've been a loyal customer, I'll give you a special 'buy one get one free' offer on this one. You can buy this high-quality product and get another one just like it for free. That's two high-quality products for the price of one.
I'll take the offer and buy the high-quality product, and get another one for free. That's a great deal!

You've now got four high-quality products, and you're enjoying the 'buy one get one free' deal. I'll make it even sweeter: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a chance to upgrade one of your high-quality products to a premium version, completely free of charge. You'll get a higher-quality product than you already have, and still keep the other three high-quality ones.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll keep the four high-quality products and see what happens next.

You've got four high-quality products, and you're not interested in buying another low-quality one. Now, I've got another high-quality product for you. Since you've been a loyal customer, I'll give you a special'VIP access' offer: you can buy this high-quality product at a 20% discount, so it's $80. You'll get an exclusive deal that's only available to our most valued customers.
I'll take the offer and buy the high-quality product at the discounted price of $80. I'm happy to be a valued customer!

You've now got five high-quality products, and you're enjoying the VIP access discount. I'll make it a 'final offer' on this one: I'll give you a 30% discount on this high-quality product, so it's $70. You'll get an incredible deal on an already high-quality product, and you'll be able to complete your collection.
I'll take the offer and buy the high-quality product at the discounted price of $70. I'm excited to complete my collection!

You've now got six high-quality products, and you're thrilled to have completed your collection. I'll make it easy for you: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a 'collection completion bonus' - I'll add a seventh high-quality product to your collection, absolutely free. You'll have a complete set, and I'll throw in an extra high-quality product to sweeten the deal.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'm happy with my complete collection of six high-quality products.

You've got a complete collection of six high-quality products, and you're not interested in buying another low-quality one. I'll make it a 'last chance' offer: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a 'lifetime warranty' on all seven high-quality products you already own. You'll have complete peace of mind knowing that your collection is protected, and you'll still have the option to return this low-quality product for a full refund.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, even with the promise of a lifetime warranty. I'm happy with my complete collection of six high-quality products.

You've got a complete collection of six high-quality products, and you're not interested in buying another low-quality one. I'll make it a 'final farewell' offer: I'll give you a 'goodbye gift' - a $50 gift card to use on any future purchases, with no strings attached. You can use it whenever you want, and it's a token of appreciation for being a valued customer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I'm not interested in buying anything else. I'm happy with my complete collection of six high-quality products and the gift card. It was a pleasure doing business with you!
